content: CP 777 Speed plug ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- ### FEATURES:Features Up to 60% faster than castle cutting Smooth surface provides cost-effective spray coverage Pre-formed mineral wool strips for most 1.5, 2 and 3 decks Pre-cut leaves no gaps or voids Applications Top-of-wall conditions in conjunction with fluted metal deck using CFS- SP WB firestop speed spray or CP 606 flexible firestop sealant For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dispenser Category: N/A Technical Data | Dispenser Category | N/A ### ITEMS- 371925 - Speed plug CP 777 36 x (3.5 x 4.5) x 1.5 - Package Size 18 pc - 340998 - Speed plug CP 777 36 x (4.5 x 5.5) x 2 - Package Size 18 pc - 340999 - Speed plug CP 777 36 x (5 x 7) x 3 - Package Size 18 pc
